title: Socrates’ Garden
title_annotation: installation, c., computer-aided  Acrylics on plywood

constellations_other.name: Distributed Consciousness
constellations_other.description: Distributed Consciousness began an NFT collection on the eco-friendly Tezos blockchain. The 256 images of cephalopods, inspired by the artist’s time spent snorkeling off Turkey's Mediterranean coastline, were created using custom AI software coded by the artist.

description:
